section.title: Rancher 部署 Nginx
section.screen: [root@localhost ~]# cat nginx.yaml apiVersion: v1 kind: Service metadata: name: nginx labels: app: nginx spec: ports: - port: 88 targetPort: 80 selector: app: nginx type: NodePort --- apiVersion: apps/v1 kind: Deployment metadata: name: nginx labels: app: nginx spec: replicas: 3 selector: matchLabels: app: nginx template: metadata: labels: app: nginx spec: containers: - name: nginx image: nginx:latest ports: - containerPort: 80
[root@localhost ~]# rancher kubectl create -f nginx.yaml service/nginx created deployment.apps/nginx created

[root@localhost ~]# rancher kubectl get deployment -n default NAME READY UP-TO-DATE AVAILABLE AGE nginx 3/3 3 3 113s
[root@localhost ~]# rancher kubectl get service -n default NAME TYPE CLUSTER-IP EXTERNAL-IP PORT(S) AGE kubernetes ClusterIP 10.43.0.1 <none> 443/TCP 156m nginx NodePort 10.43.111.205 <none> 88:32646/TCP 119s
